findings.Liver: The unenhanced visualized liver is unremarkable
findings.Biliary: Multiple small stones noted in gallbladder and cystic duct, mild gallbladder wall thickening, mild edema/trace pericholecystic fluid, no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation, common bile duct within normal limits
findings.Pancreas: Multiple cystic lesions likely representing side-branch type IPMNs, largest 1.2 cm in uncinate process, main pancreatic duct normal
findings.Adrenal Glands: Right adrenal gland unremarkable, left adrenal lesion 1.9 cm compatible with lipid rich adenoma
findings.Kidneys: A few subcentimeter probable cysts in left kidney, otherwise unremarkable
findings.Lymph Nodes: No enlarged upper abdominal lymph nodes
